name: BomberMario
description:
Game Description:

Use the arrow keys to control Mario's movements and hit the spacebar to drop your bombs. Watch out for those sinister Koopa turtles! Let off a bomb before they attack you and you lose a life. With a bit of luck and a lot of skill you will find your way out of this endless arcade labyrinth.

Bomb the walls and corridors, blast through the zigzagging barricades. There has got to be a way out of here somewhere. The more explosions you set off, the higher your score. Just be careful not to bomb yourself. Find the secret door out of the maze and you will immediately move on to the next level.

Traditional arcade graphics and a jazzy, animated score create hours of addictive and easy fun for all level of gamers. Download this free full version game today and help Mario escape the labyrinth.
